Have you heard of Oshar the sorcerer? Of course you have! He's the continent's preeminent magical mind.

I'm his best pupil, destined to continue his research when Oshar enters the Dream.

Help me, and you'll earn goodwill from both the current master sorcerer...and the next one."What do you need?"

I want to demonstrate mastery of the intellect by uplifting the intelligence of the local fauna.

My first efforts focus on the most cunning creature in the refuge: sloths. No, really. From you, I need sloth claws so I can create a potion that will metaphorically "de-claw" them and render them civilized.

I'll write to Oshar that I can start testing the sloth docility potion soon.

Imagine returning years from now to find an entire sloth-based civilization, with sloth religion, sloth culture, a sloth economy...like the ancient empire of the giants, but with sloths.
